movieDescription: The story of the film is based on the life of Mallesham, a Padma Sri award winner who invented the Asu machine. Mallesham(Priyadarshi) and his parents belong to a rural village in Telangana. Mallesham’s mother(Jhansi) is a handloom weaver who works very hard. After staying for long hours on the handloom work, the doctors reveal that if she does any more of the weaving job, her hand can get paralyzed. Seeing this crazy situation, Mallesham decides to invent the a special machine for her mom.

Uttama Villain, roughly translated to a virtuous villain is about a struggling actor past his prime, getting ready for one last act that will establish him as the biggest performer of all time. The story covers a time span of approximately 1500 years as it keeps moving to and fro in different time zones.
staring: Kamal Haasan, K. Balachander, K. Viswanath

movieDescription: Jagan(Siddharth) is a food safety officer who becomes a pain for several business people. He falls in love with a school teacher Jyothi(Catherine Tresa) and when everything seems to be going fine, all those business people who got busted through Jagan start dying one after the other.
staring: Siddharth Narayan, Catherine Tresa, Kabir Duhan

movieDescription: Guna is a happy-go-lucky youngster whose life revolves around his friends, family and the girl he loves. When he is framed for a crime he didn`t commit, Guna is left with no choice but to solve the case and prove his innocence.

Call Boy is a quirky crime-comedy story of a youngster who becomes a gigolo to make his acting dream come true. When his friend offers him a chance to earn crores by stealing money from his client’s house, he accepts it and gets into deeper problems.

On his father’s wish, Vivaan Aditya (Sekhar Varma) visits India. There he embarks on a life-changing road trip and meets Bangaram (Sudarshan) and a village girl Advaika (Viviya Santh) who change his approach towards life.

When his family hits financial trouble, Alex Danyliuk turns to a life of crime and identity theft, with the help of Sye, a street-wise hustler who introduces him to the world of black market trading, Kira, a young female hacker, and contacts on the dark web. After finding success in causing financial market chaos, they gain the attention of Z, a mysterious masked figure, who’s the head of an organization known as Anonymous, and a number one target by the FBI
staring: Callan McAuliffe, Lorraine Nicholson, Daniel Eric Gold

movieDescription: The story tells the story of Sun Wukong (Eddie Peng) and Erlang Shen (Shawn Yue), who come to the Immortal Mountain to cultivate their skills. They gain friendship, experience love and ultimately betrayal, growing throughout their life journey.
staring: Eddie Peng, Shawn Yue, Ni Ni

movieDescription: Hoping for a fresh start, Julia, a troubled woman, moves to Los Angeles with her new boyfriend. After settling into a new home, mysterious things begin to happen. It’s not long before Julia becomes convinced that her demons have moved with her.
staring: Haylie Duff, Mike Faiola, Teri Polo

movieDescription: Strange serial murders keep happening in Hyderabad which bothers the police. Meanwhile, Arjun (Krishna), a kickboxer is in love with Sanjana (Elsa Ghosh) and manages to win her love. Arjun becomes the prime suspect in the serial killings when a special officer is appointed to nab the killer. Arjun notices a strange relation to all these killings has with Krishna Rao Supermarket.
staring: Tanikella Bharani, Elsa Ghosh, Gowtham Raju

movieDescription: Jagan(Siddharth) is a food safety officer who becomes a pain for several business people. He falls in love with a school teacher Jyothi(Catherine Tresa) and when everything seems to be going fine, all those business people who got busted through Jagan start dying one after the other.
staring: Siddharth Narayan, Catherine Tresa, Kabir Duhan

movieDescription: Tempt Ravi (Abhishek Pachipala) is a guy who has weakness for beautiful women. As soon as he spots a gorgeous girl, he gets tempted. In this process, he gets into a physical relationship with many ladies. One fine day, he falls in love with Bhavana (Ayesh Singh) and gets into a serious love affair with her. But the twist in the tale arises when he knows about a serious health scare.
staring: Abhishek Reddy, Bhanu Sree, Ayesha Singh

movieDescription: Mahesh Achanta became an ace comedian in the Telugu film industry after the super success of his character in Rangasthalam, tried his luck as the protagonist in this movie. Mahesh, a die-hard fan of Hero Nagarjuna falls in love with a girl who is the daughter of another die-hard fan of Hero Nagarjuna. There are many references to Hero Nagarjuna in the movie to entertain the fans.
staring: Mahesh Achanta, Somi Varma, Thota Madhu

movieDescription: Abhilash(Atharva) is an upcoming director who wants to make it big at any cost and for this, he decides to make a film based on a criminal. He starts researching about Gaddalakonda Ganesh(Varun Tej) a brutal criminal and finally meets him and starts to know him closely. After a point, he reveals to Ganesh that he is ready to start the film. But the twist in the tale arises when Ganesh demands that he himself will be the hero of the film.
Indian government is on the look out of a dreaded terrorist named Qureshi(Rajesh Khattar) who has now camped in Pakistan. To bring him back, RAW appoints a dare and devil officer Arjun for the task.
staring: Tottempudi Gopichand, Zareen Khan, Rajesh Khattar

movieDescription: Kapil(Aadi) is a software employee who falls in love with Kanchanamala(Shraddha Srinath). Just when everything seems to be going fine, Kanchanamala’s father rejects the marriage proposal all of a sudden citing Kapil’s dad(Naresh) as a huge problem.
